1. Epic

Debugging and Troubleshooting

Epic

Created a mobile and tablet-friendly view of the help center using Storyline, CSS and HTML to help users solve common errors that can occur when using Epic's Cogito to import non-Epic data.

Employee Self-Service

Payroll

An interactive walk-through of the Employee Portal to teach employees how to view and update their paycheck, direct deposit, W-4 and YTD information.

HR KPIs

Metrics and Reporting

This course was developed to provide an overview of the employee metrics, reporting and exporting functionality of the Dashboard along with exposure to the Scorecard and Executive Summary.

HR Operations

Recruitment & Voluntary Attrition

Designed to educate Revenue Cycle and Employment & Recruiting Analysts how to use the voluntary attrition, turnover and turnover forecasting data to make operational decisions.

Timekeeping - Supervisors & Managers

This course was designed to provide instructions on managing employeesâ€™ timecards in Kronos to ensure documentation requirements are met and all employees are compensated accurately.

Annual Education

Non-Clinical Staff

Developed training topics ranging from reporting a safety concern to understanding how a ventricular assist device functions in order to meet the ever-changing healthcare needs of the community.

Fax Cover Sheet Redesign

Reduced miscellaneous calls to the Transcription and ROI Departments by 47% by redesigning Swedish Medical Center's fax cover sheet.
